figures.imgAlt: Oakland Internet Cat Video Festival splash page.
figures.figcaption: I pulled in a feed of hand-picked cat images via a private API to serve as the background for our lovely typography.

figures.imgAlt: The first schedule for OICVF in 2013.
figures.figcaption: OICVF's event schedule brought up onto the homepage on the day of the event for attendees strolling through the event in-person.

figures.imgAlt: The OICVF logo and event date.
figures.figcaption: The navigation and heading was one of my earliest responsive sites. This responsiveness made it key to festival-goers being able to use the site as an e-program.
